title: Verify: Selecting MLB.TV app icon successfully opens the MLB.TV AppleTV app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AppleTV 
AND the "MLB.TV" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.TV can be accessed while the AppleTV device is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AppleTV device
AND their HTML 5 device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND the "MLB.TV" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

title: Verify: MLB.TV can be accessed while the AppleTV device is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their AppleTV device
AND the "MLB.TV" app is present in the device Apps Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects MLB.TV from the device Apps menu
custom_expected: THEN the MLB.TV app will open successfully

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND a Free MLB.com User account has been created
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Free MLB.com User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Free MLB.com User account password
custom_expected: Free User / Non- Entitlement account is allowed to Log into Application

title: Free User / Non-Entitlement account is allowed to play FGOTD Live/VOD archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date (up to and including Today's FGOTD file) that contains FGOTD Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for FGOTD assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content
custom_expected: Playback will be initiated for any/all available FGOTD Live/VOD archive file(s)

title: FGOTD Ads trigger - Pre-Roll Ads Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date (up to and including Today's FGOTD file) that contains FGOTD Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for FGOTD assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the FGOTD media content
custom_expected: FGOTD Asset must Show Freewheel served pre-roll video ads to user before Playback begins

title: Trigger - Recaps Ads Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user selects Game Recaps
AND the user selects any date and available recaps assets from previously played games 
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the Recap media content
custom_expected: RecapAsset must Show Freewheel served video ads to user before Recap playback begins

title: Trigger - Game Highlights Ads Playback (if applicable)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Free User / Non- Entitlement account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through Content Files 
AND the user selects Any previous Game Date that contains Game Highlights Assets from previously played games 
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the Game Highlight media content
custom_expected: Game Highlight Asset must Show Freewheel served video ads to user before Game Highlight playback begins

title: Non-FGOTD Gameday Sign-in Notification for Free User/Non-Entitlement account
Pre-Roll Ads Appear
Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND a Monthly MLB.com User account has been purchased/entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Premium Monthly MLB.com User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Premium Monthly MLB.com User account password
custom_expected: THE Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application

title: Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to play Live/VOD archive games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Premium Monthly account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date that contains Game Content Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for Game Content Assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the MLB.TV Game media content
custom_expected: THE Premium Monthly account entitlement is allowed to play Live/VOD archive games

title: Premium Monthly Account Entitlement is allowed to see 60fps Live/VOD Games
Premium Yearly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND a Yearly MLB.com User account has been purchased/entitled
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a Premium Yearly MLB.com User account (upon Login request)
AND enters the Premium Yearly MLB.com User account password
custom_expected: THE Premium yearly account entitlement is allowed to Log into Application

title: Premium Yearly account entitlement is allowed to play ALL Live/VOD archive games
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the MLB.TV app has been accessed
AND the user is logged in with a Premium Yearly account
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Date that contains Game Content Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbnails for Game Content Assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the MLB.TV Game media content
custom_expected: THE Premium Annual account entitlement is allowed to play ALL Live/VOD archive games

title: Premium Yearly Account Entitlement is allowed to see 60fps Live/VOD Games
Single Team Account Entitlement is allowed to log into Application
Single Team Account Entitlement is allowed to play All Live/VOD games for the team associated with said account
Single Team Account Entitlement is not allowed to play Live/VOD games for any team no associated with the account
Video Stream downgrades to 30fps when using a Single Team Entitled Account on a 60fps video feed
TBS Authorized
custom_preconds:
- App is launched and pointing to QA server
- TBS "live" Playoff test game is set up on day user is viewing
- Tester is logged in with an MLB Premium/Adobe Turner Authorized account 

2014 accounts can be found here (and can be used for 2015 tests): 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/styleguide/Activation+Flow+-+2014+Postseason#ActivationFlow-2014Postseason-UserTestingInformation
custom_steps:
1. Activate test TBS Game Tile
2. Launch TBS video feed
custom_expected: Video feed launches and plays as expected

title: Any Postseason MVPD Authorized Game - International Feed Launch
custom_preconds:
- Tester's device must have IP locked to location outside of the US (requires special set-up, Sean Goldsmith to help!)
- App is launched and pointing to QA server
- A "live" Postseason test game (MVPD Auth) is set up on day user is viewing, game is not internationally blacked out
- Tester is logged in with an MLB Premium International Account

2014 accounts can be found here (and can be used for 2015 tests): 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/styleguide/Activation+Flow+-+2014+Postseason#ActivationFlow-2014Postseason-UserTestingInformation
custom_steps: Activate test Game Tile
custom_expected: Feed Select's Video button shows "International" tag (INT) and video feed launches and plays as expected

title: TBS - Not Authorized
custom_preconds:
- App is launched and pointing to QA server
- TBS "live" Playoff test game is set up on day user is viewing
- Tester is logged in with an MLB Premium account that is *not authorized to play TBS* 

Note: For each "Not Authorized" test try a different type of Authorized account (e.g. Fox for TBS, No Auth, Etc.)

2014 accounts can be found here (and can be used for 2015 tests): 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/styleguide/Activation+Flow+-+2014+Postseason#ActivationFlow-2014Postseason-UserTestingInformation
custom_steps:
1. Activate test TBS Game Tile
2. Launch TBS video feed
custom_expected:
MVPD Authorization Prompt appears as expected - note that expected Network tag appears in body text, see json files for current text:

http://qa.mlb.com/device-config/v1/mlbtv-messages/en-US/atv-v2.json

The above page offers links to the expected QA files, for Prod versions use https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/SFProduct/Feature%3A+MVPD+Authentication+for+MLB.TV

title: Verify tab menu categories display as expected
custom_preconds:
IF app has been installed
AND has been launched
custom_steps:
WHEN the app loads
AND the Main Menu appears
custom_expected:
THEN user will the following:

ON THE LEFT:
MLB team logo carousel traversing

ON THE RIGHT:

Today's Games
Standings
Game Recaps
Team By Team
Subscribe to MLB.tv
Settings

title: Verify when launching the app, the default highlighted option is "Today's Games"
Today game tile navigation
custom_steps:
WHEN game tile in 1st position is in focus (first game on the list)
AND user presses furthest down
OR presses furthest up
custom_expected: THEN the grid navigation does not loop; top to bottom/bottom to top

title: Verify that the (To)Day schedule goes back to the beginning of the season
custom_steps:
At main menu, select Today's games
When day schedule is displayed, press left d-pad and hold, allowing the schedule to navigate to the very first available date in schedule
Observe date
custom_expected: Day schedule should display the first game of the Spring Training for the current year.

title: Verify All available AL Central items display on sub-menu page
custom_expected:

Cleveland
Detroit
Kansas City 
Minnesota

custom_expected:

custom_expected:

title: Team: User is able to select a favorite team
Team: When a Favorite Team is selected, a star appears next to the Team's Logo
Team: Favorite Team goes to the front of the list
Team: User is able to unselect a favorite team
Team: Group is order by League (American vs National)
Team: Every team and team's logo is shown on the page according to MLB.com
Team: When a team is selected, a user can navigate to previous games they had (2015, 2014) and up-and-coming games
custom_steps: When a team is selected,
custom_expected: A user can navigate to Recent games , previous 2 seasons (2015, 2014) and Upcoming games

Verify All available Highlight items are playable via the sub-menu page
Verify All available Settings options are visible and accessible in the sub-menu display
custom_expected:
Subscribe to MLB.TV / Log Out
Scores

Verify Spoilers (Hide/Show Scores) functionality
Yearly In-App Purchase
Monthly In-App Purchase
Restore In-App Purchse
Wired Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the MLB.TV AppleTV (Gen 2 or 3) device connected to a wired network connection
AND the user has accessed the "MLB.TV" Application
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER locates any game media content file
AND the USER attempts to play ANY game media content file
custom_expected:
THEN the game media video stream will launch successfully
AND the game media content file will play without issue

title: Wireless Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the MLB.TV AppleTV (Gen 2 or 3) device connected to a wireless network connection
AND the user has accessed the "MLB.TV" Application
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER locates any game media content file
AND the USER attempts to play ANY game media content file
custom_expected:
THEN the game media video stream will launch successfully
AND the game media content file will play without issue

title: Full VOD Archive Playback to Exit
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch ANY ARCHIVE/VOD video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to Schedule (asset) page

title: Full Live Game Linear Playback to Exit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch ANY LIVE video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to Schedule (asset) page

title: Seek FWD to Exit - VOD Archive
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER launches a VOD Archive video feed
AND seek to the END of video
custom_expected:
THEN the video will pause at end of video
And when user resumes playback at regular speed
the video player will transition from playback and return to the Schedule (asset) page gracefully

title: Seek BACK (RWD) to Front of Program
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have accessed the "MLB.TV" application
AND the USER is signed in with a Premium Monthly OR Yearly account entitlement
custom_steps:
WHEN the USER launches a VOD Archive video feed
AND seek FWD > 10 mins into program
AND allow > 30 secs of playback
AND seek BACK (RWD) to head of program
custom_expected: THEN the video will resume playback from beginning and continue without issue

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
Network: Verify when throttling connection strength that bitrate playback adjusts without issue in both directions
Wired Connection: Launch and playback
Wireless Connection: Launch and playback
Video Playback: Wired Connection Lost ***
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is successfully playing full screen
AND the AppleTV (Gen 2 or 3) device is connected to a wired network connection
custom_steps: WHEN we disconnect the LAN from the wall
custom_expected: THEN the expected fail message appears

title: Video Playback: Wireless Connection Lost ***
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is successfully playing full screen
AND the AppleTV (Gen 4) device is connected to an Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_steps: WHEN we turn off the Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_expected: THEN the expected fail message appears

title: Video Playback: Wireless Connection - No Data (Blocked) ***
custom_preconds: ATV/Proxy network setup and set up test scenario when data is choked

title: App Pages: Wired Connection Lost ***
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are navigating through the MLB.TV App's sub-menu pages 
AND the AppleTV device is connected to a wired network connection
custom_steps: WHEN we disconnect the LAN from the wall
custom_expected: THEN the expected fail message appears

title: App Pages: Wireless Connection Lost ***
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are navigating through the MLB.TV App's sub-menu pages 
AND the AppleTV (Gen 2 or 3) device is connected to an Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_steps: WHEN we turn off the Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_expected: THEN the expected fail message appears

title: App Pages: Wireless Connection - No Data (Blocked) ***
custom_preconds: ATV/Proxy network setup and set up test scenario when data is choked
